item.description:
Sunset Grill & Tap, for anybody who hasn't been yet (gasp shock horror) is a sweet spot with enough space for a meetup. UPDATE: We are increasing the RSVP limit and we will be upstairs in the pool hall. I think we're going to have about half of the hall.

Great beer and drinks list, great pub food at cheap prices... Right on the green line, easy to find. Bring your Fun hat.

-----------

P.S. If you would like to, please bring in canned goods to any event this November to give to Zachary or Nora. At the end of the month we will be donating these goods to the Greater Boston Food Bank on behlaf of the Boston Atheists.
item.name: SUNSET: Dinner, Drinks, Secular Merriment
